name: Lost Souls (rachelquijano, pnavarro1209, Turned Into A Newt, EternalCat)
name_original: Lost Souls (rachelquijano, pnavarro1209, Turned Into A Newt, EternalCat)
description: As the dungeon master, recover the souls of fallen heroes and revive those who once set foot upon the domain. The player needs to collect all lost souls and give them back to the fallen hero to win the game. But the evil red dragons will try to chase and attack the player, once the enemy caught the player, the player will lose one life, lose all the lifes game will be over. The player can pick up Superpower to be invincible and kill the dragons. The player can also get an extra life by picking up the blue heart in the dungeon.
